lyric:
[00:13.890]Don't go tonight
[00:18.750]Stay here one more time
[00:22.140]Remind me what it's like
[00:26.900]And let's fall in love one more time
[00:34.220]I need you now by my side
[00:40.940]It tears me up when you turn me down
[00:48.060]I'm begging please, just stick around
[00:55.280]
[00:55.500]I'm sorry, don't leave me, I want you here with me
[01:02.380]I know that your love is gone
[01:09.150]I can't breathe, I'm so weak, I know this isn't easy
[01:16.090]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[01:20.720]That your love is gone
[01:23.870]
[01:29.730]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[01:34.379]That your love is gone
[01:38.680]
[01:50.290]I'm sorry, don't leave me, I want you here with me
[01:57.200]I know that your love is gone
[02:04.030]I can't breathe, I'm so weak, I know this isn't easy
[02:14.469]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[02:19.080]That your love is gone
[02:24.560]
[02:25.860]That your love is gone
[02:30.039]
[02:34.970]I can't breathe, I'm so weak, I know this isn't easy
[02:42.599]Don't tell me that your love is gone
[02:48.410]That your love is gone
[02:52.620]

[00:00.300]
[00:00.300]
[00:00.300]
[00:00.300]
[00:00.300]
[00:00.300]
[00:13.890]今夜请别离去
[00:18.750]再为我驻足一次
[00:22.140]时刻提醒着我曾经的美好
[00:26.900]就让我们再次坠入爱河
[00:34.220]此刻我需要你的陪伴
[00:40.940]你的拒绝让我的心支离破碎
[00:48.060]我祈求着你，请别离去
[00:55.280]
[00:55.500]抱歉，请不要离开我，此刻我只想你陪着我
[01:02.380]尽管我明白你的爱已经消逝殆尽
[01:09.150]我无法呼吸，脆弱不堪，我知道接受事实的不易
[01:16.090]别亲口对我说你的爱已经消失殆尽
